summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6196 for the improvement of Seaview Avenue from West 65th Street to approximately 175 feet north of West 67th Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87975, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
